content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun and easy. The description of "the difference between" is a little ambiguous, but the example makes it clear what is required.
Suitable for fastest and shortest.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fine contribution for a quick clash.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I love this game
It looks like you're only using uppercase letters, in that case I think you should write it in the Constraints section

What do you mean by "even characters in the alphabet"?
Do you mean characters with an "even index in the alphabet"?
Example of characters with an even index in the alphabet:
* A (index 0)
* C (index 2)
* D (index 4)

Goal section
* Please format "s" using the [[variable]] syntax (twice).

* Please change "even characters" to "even letters".

* Please specify which difference the clash requires: "odd minus even" or "even minus odd". The current wording does not make that clear.

* Please add:

The index of a letter refers to its position in the alphabet, with {{A}} being {{0}}, {{B}} being {{1}}, and so on up to {{Z}} being {{25}}. 

* Please change "omitted" to "ignored".

Input section
* Please delete "INPUT:".

* Please format "s" using the [[variable]] syntax.

Output section
* Please delete "OUTPUT:".

* Suggest to delete "d".

Constraints section
* Please add:
All letters in [[s]] are in the upper case.

Thanks.
